# EJS Parser
Editor.js JSON React Parser

## Convert JSON generated by editor.js to HTML
A React Library to do the job

![EJS Logo](logo.jpg)

## Supported Plugins
* Paragraph
* List
* Embed (YouTube Service)
* Header
* Simple Image
* Quote
* Table
* Delimiter

### Preview
You can preview the resulting HTML here: https://react.verdin.io/
